about.title: About Me

desc.p1: I'm a software developer, open source and tech enthusiast. Right now I'm a React Native developer building apps for humans at
desc.p2: Out of tech I have some hobbies like cook new stuff (like italian food üë®‚Äçüç≥), try become a rookie barista ‚òï or read about astronomy ü™ê  and Sci-fi üõ∏.
desc.p3: I want it to share useful tips, guides and ideas around my own experience and share my software development learning path. I hope this little space on the internet will be useful to you.

about.techsub: This is the technology stack I use the most on my daily work or just for fun

stack.javascript: The language I love and hate the most.
stack.typescript: Is literally JavaScript with syntax for types.
stack.react: The JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
stack.react_native: Create native apps for Android and iOS using React.
stack.swift: One of the most beautiful designed programming languages I ever used.
stack.swift_ui: New declarative syntax to build UI's for the Apple ecosystem.
stack.tailwind: Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.
stack.next: A powerful framework to build modern React websites.
stack.node: The JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine.
stack.graphql: A query language for your API.
stack.netlify: Build, deploy and scale modern web projects.
